name: Days of Freedom
description:
Days of freedom it's a battle royal theme based game. It's a war game where you must fight and be the last one in surviving, the game focused on the battle itself as a free for all match .

IMPORTANT NOTE:
For attack left click on target with the mouse cursor over it and a red circle should appear next click a skill icon for an attack. For new players check Game Controls & Tips before play. 
Still, we are adding more things this game was made for a jam challenge and we didn't get any good new from judges so we moved it to here ,enjoy have fun.
